channel.title: Talks on Cho-Nan Tsai CTO essays and talks
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Cho-Nan Tsai CTO essays and talks

item.title: Master Class - Building a career in software
item.description: About the Class With professional experiences in high-flying Fortune 500 companies and tiny nobody start-ups, this battle-scarred CTO shares his wisdom from his journey on becoming a professional software engineer. In this class, you will learn tips to help you navigate this fun-filled, exciting career. 1. American dream Not your typical American dream. 2. Knowing your passion Developing a true passion can make a giant difference in your career.

item.title: Crafting a Life-Changing Tech Internship Experience
item.description: Slides PDF About the Talk Every great career begins with a dream. However, that alone is often not enough. A dreamer must be given the opportunity to try, to fail and to succeed. In 1999, I was fortunate enough to go to Tokyo for a summer internship. Thatâ€™s where I met Joi Ito, got exposed to open source software for the first time and much more. It was a life-changing experience and even today I continue to cherish it.

item.title: How to (gracefully) jump start data science initiatives at a start-up
item.description: Conference 1 Conference 2 Slides for IDEAS data science talk PPTX Slides for IDEAS data science talk ODP Slides for IDEAS data science talk PDF About the Talk While machine learning and artificial intelligence can deliver a ton of value to businesses, there are still many businesses today struggling to get started with data science initiatives. Do you buy data or collect data? What type of talent to hire to get started on the first project?

item.title: A Gentle Introduction to Quantum Computing
item.description: About the Talk Quantum computers could spur the development of new breakthroughs in science, medications to save lives, machine learning methods to diagnose illnesses sooner, materials to make more efficient devices and structures, financial strategies to live well in retirement, and algorithms to quickly direct resources such as ambulances. But what exactly is quantum computing, and what does it take to achieve these quantum breakthroughs? This talk will provide a gentle introduction to those that are interested in this new computing frontier.

item.title: Lainto Coalition
item.description: At a panel, discussing the importance of cybersecurity for small- and mid-size businesses.

item.title: Big Data Opportunities in the Fintech Space
item.description: About the Talk Big data has impacted fintech in many ways. Some of the most creative applications of big data technology have been in the areas of fraud detection, marketing and credit underwriting for small business loans. This talk looks at some major players and how big data is leading innovations and shaping strategies in the space. About Camino Financial Camino Financial is a credit marketplace matching small businesses with affordable business loans, with interest rates starting at 5.
